'''Alpha v1.2.1_01'''<ref>{{ytl|94HcXdpcJlI|Minecraft Gameplay Episode 1 - The Basics|TheHomicidalTendency|November 5, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|j7WtsHchULM|<nowiki>[Minecraft]</nowiki>Hellgate?|vexx21322|November 5, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on November 5, 2010, to fix a bug relating to armor.

This version is duplicated inside the [[launcher]], as attempting to play a version labeled "[[Alpha v1.2.1]]" downloads and launches v1.2.1_01 instead.<ref>{{bug|MCL-9282}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed armor not having an effect on the damage taken.</onlyinclude>
